metadata.title: CVE-2024-42311 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-42311` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
